/* ###### Common Constants Needed to Configure Serial Ports ########## */
/* Serial Protocol Selection Values */
User 4
NMEA 1
ACSES 3
None 0
NMEA 1
ACSES 3
/* Baud Rate constants for lookup table */
300 0
1200 1
2400 2
4800 3
9600 4
19200 5
38400 6
57600 7
115200 8
/* Parity constants for lookup table*/
None 0
Odd 1
Even 2
/* Databits Constants for lookup table */
8 0
7 1
/* Stopbits constants for lookup table */
1 0
2 1
/* Flow control constants for lookup table */
None 0
Hw 1
/* Time zone constants for timezone selection */
Gmt 0
Eastern 1
Central 2
Mountain 3
Pacific 4
Alaska 5
Atlantic 6
Arizona 7
Newfoundland 8
Aus Western 9
Aus Central 10
Aus Central No DST 11
Aus Eastern 12
Aus Eastern No DST 13
Num Zones 14
/* Flow control constants for lookup table */
Disabled 0
Internal GPS Receiver 1
External Serial Port 1 2
External via Class C/D Messages 3
SNTP Client 4
Unicast 0
Broadcast 1
/* cdl compiler log constants*/
Error 1
Warning 2
Info 3
Debug 4
